meanings.sent1: After quitting for a year, he readdicted to smoking.
meanings.sent2: She readdicted to caffeine after trying to cut back.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was readdicted to chocolate after just one bite.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sweets readdicted her like a powerful magnet.
meanings.sent5: The temptation to readdicted to social media was too strong to resist.
